short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get Joke Extension is a simple web extension to get random jokes. Press the button for funny jokes to cheer you up!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get Joke Extension is an easy-to-use web extension that brings joy and smiles to your everyday life. Thanks to the integration with the free JokeAPI, you get a new joke every time you press a button. From simple and fun jokes to more complex and funny memes, our extension will help you relax and lift your spirits. Just click on the title for a new joke.
Renewal! The web extension now has an options page where you can choose the type of jokes you receive - all sorts or safe mode (the default). More filters and the ability to choose the language of the joke will be added in the future.
